name: Ragdoll Slayer
description:
Welcome back to the Medieval Era! Here only the strongest survive.

Ragdoll Slayer presents a new action-funny game in a battle for death or life.In the absence of a force of gravity, you will fight others with all kinds of cold weapons to prove who deserves to stay alive. You don't have to relax, because at any time someone can invite you to a duel and if you are not prepared, you risk your life. Sharpen your weapon well to cause as much damage as possible.

You may have several opponents at once, so try to gain as much experience as possible to instill fear in others. Only 1 to the end will be able to conquer the castle and the princess. Do you think you are among the candidates? Let's see what you can do and try to survive until the end!

Game Features :
- Wheel of Luck
- 3 Modes ( Training Room,Survival,Story Mode)
- 14 Skins with Health Bonus
